static java.lang.String repair(java.lang.String in)
          Repais minor glitches (differences between HTML and XHTML): Close all <br> tags Close all <hr> tags Close all <img> tags Ensure that a surrounding tag pair exists Replace HTML entities with numeric entities

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

HtmlUtil

Method Detail

htmlize

public static java.lang.String htmlize(java.lang.String in)
convert plain text to some HTML look-a-like:
  • Convert linebreaks to <br>
  • Convert <, > and & to entities

repair

public static java.lang.String repair(java.lang.String in)
                               throws XMLServException
Repais minor glitches (differences between HTML and XHTML):
  • Close all <br> tags
  • Close all <hr> tags
  • Close all <img> tags
  • Ensure that a surrounding tag pair exists
  • Replace HTML entities with numeric entities

Throws:
XMLServException

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
simple text -> HTML converter. Reads text from stdin and writes converted text to stdout.
